Others: Jalen Smith, Julian Phillips, Lonzo Ball and Ayo Dosunmu all had good games off the bench for the Bulls.
Those four were a combined 8/13 from three and they combined for 36 points.
The Bulls tied their franchise record on Monday night as they knocked down 25 threes.
Billy Donovan mentioned the bench's contribution in the third quarter and their overall play in the second half.
Lonzo Ball emphasized the importance of taking three-pointers and the team's ability to respond when trailing.
